about_the_game: POSTALVERSE has gone mad! More mad, that is. With POSTAL: Brain Damaged Hyperstrange introduces a whole new gameplay take on the beloved Running With Scissors frenchise. The first official POSTAL spin-off looks very retro, plays very modern, and sounds very awesome. Brace yourself for the all-original soundtrack by Kacper Kajzderski and Piotr Stachera, the duo going by the name Ivory Tower Soundworks, known for their work with ELDERBORN, Blood West, or RAYZE.
